评论详情: Easy shirt to throw one but still feel cute and put together! Very flattering, soft, and great fit.
Top looks just like description. Very comfortable and true to size for me. I’m 5’8 , 148 pounds and ordered a size medium. Got it in green too.

Cute and comfy shirt! It is on the thin side, so you have to wear a nude bra underneath or you can see right through it. It's great with shorts, jeans, or leggings. Will be getting a lot of wear out of this in the spring! I am 5'6, 145 lbs, and got my usual medium and it is just slightly boxy and oversized on me.
Exactly as described and fits well. High-quality

I love this top!! It is very nice quality, the fabric is great quality and medium thickness, not see through.  The colors are nice and vibrant.  It is true to size with a bit of extra room and the length is perfect for a little tuck in or worn outside.  Also the stripes on the side match up when sewn together. I will get this in other colors.

I ordered some cute tops for next spring and summer, so I will have to wait a couple of months for the weather to warm up enough to wear this shirt, but I loved the way it looked when I tried it on. I cannot wait to show it off once the weather starts to warm. The sizing seems correct and there were no flaws in the garment.
95% cotton as description states. Comfortable and cute. Bought a second one in another color.
A little bit of puff on the sleeve add some style and the colors are great. I love the shape and the fabric is nice. The collar and sleeve fabric is different but held up in the wash.

I love the way this fits and the colors are so vibrant. It fits true to size. I got a medium and I'm 5'7 - 155lbs with DDs. It's a loose fitting shirt which I like a lot. The red part of the sleeves is a little bit more fitted which gives it a more stylish look.

评论概述: The fit of the shirt is odd
评论详情: The fit of this shirt is odd. It's not very flattering, looks boxy and there's parts of it where I feel like the symmetry in the arms is off. The color combo seemed fun from the product descriptions but when wearing I feel like a big candy-cane. I'm not a fan of the shirt fit or style.
I feel very nostalgic yet modern all in one. I love this striped top and the colors!
This shirt is super cute! It is the perfect length. Not too long but also not a crop top by any means. The colors are very vivid as well. I love it!
This is a nice tee shirt. Fit is loose and comfortable. The stripes are bold and look great. Makes a great summer shirt.
The colors are different from advertised. Did not like the shape of the sleeves. Will return it.
Cute t-shirt! Oversized. I ordered a Medium and am 5'6" 175lbs. The medium fit nicely.

I like this shirt however there are some things I do not like. It is more of a fitted shirt then a loose and I ordered larger for an oversized fit and it was still snug. The arm holes are a little tight making the sleeves feel tighter then preferred. The colors were much brighter then pictured but overall, it is a nice shirt.

I like the look, the fit and the feel of this classic t-shirt.  The colors are vivid and the white is bright.  I will wear this for sure on the fourth of July.  It fits me well, like a t-shirt should, loose but not baggy.  It is 95% cotton, but it feels soft and pliable, not like traditional cotton. Maybe it's the 5% elastine.  It is a well made product.  It checks all the boxes for me as far as t-shirts go.

This shirt is great! I love the stripe print, it is so colorful and different. This shirt fits better than expected and I love the little longer sleeve for fall. I washed and dried it and it is still perfect. Very happy with this shirt.

I love the colors, I love the stripes, and the shirt looks great on. The fabric is soft and comfortable, 95% cotton and 5% elastane. The shirt fits well, as expected. It's a great casual shirt that goes well with jeans.
Love this little t-shirt, the puff sleeve gives it a nice style.  Fits true to size, cute for spring/summer, but also under a blazer in the colder months!
The top fit true to size and appeared well-made.  The colors were just too masculine for me.  Except for the cuffed sleeve, it would easily be mistaken for a men’s top.  Ended up returning it.

This shirt is very cute! My daughter immediately commented that I looked like a jumbo strawberry! LOL  The only con I have for the shirt is that it runs a little small.  I would definitely suggest you order up a size if you want to have the loose fit shown in the picture. I ordered my normal size and it fits like a normal t-shirt but not really at all loose so I took off 1 star for the bad sizing.

I'm a big fan of Dokotoo and this shirt continues my love of them.  This little shirt is really a basic simple t-shirt.  But the cuffed sleeve and the colorful stripes bring it a little personality.  The material is a little stiffer, thicker than a regular cotton t-shirt which helps elevate this a little more.  I do think I should have ordered a size up due to my chest being a little on the larger size and if I had read the sizing chart I would've noticed this.  This shirt does fit and it fits comfortably, just not as loose as pictured which is the look I wanted.

Love the fit and the design of this tee. Feels vintage. The stripe configuration and sleeves are very flattering. My only criticism is that the color is not exactly as pictured. The background color on the black and white is really more cream than white, which gives the entire shirt a yellow cast. I would still recommend.
It gives a nice oversized look, great for lounging around the house or for a casual look

I’m loving the retro, early 80’s/late 90’s wide stripes lately! This top is cute and fits a little on the boxier side, which makes it good for wearing with leggings and/or tucking into jeans. Fabric is 95% cotton and has a fair amount of stretch. Color is true to the photos, as is presentation.

This is a cute shirt! I did think it was going to be blue and black, but it is blue and brown. Not an issue, but just in case you thought the same…  I ordered a medium and feel like I could have easily gone with a small. I’m 5’4” and 135 and don’t like my clothes to fit tight, but even a small would not have been tight.  The sleeves are ruched just a little and it gives it a slightly feminine touch. Will be a cute shirt in a wear year-round.

评论概述: Nice Women's Striped Color Block Tee
评论详情: This striped color block tee is exactly what I needed for an easy, casual summer look. The loose, relaxed fit makes it incredibly comfortable to wear, especially on warm days. I love the color block design—it’s fun and adds a bit of personality without being too bold, making it easy to pair with anything from jeans to shorts or even a cute skirt.  The crewneck and short sleeves give it a classic t-shirt feel, but the color combination makes it feel more stylish and put-together. The fabric is soft and breathable, perfect for staying cool while still looking chic. It’s the kind of top that I can throw on and feel good in, whether I’m running errands or meeting friends for a casual outing.  For anyone looking for a comfy, versatile tee with a pop of style, this color block top is a fantastic choice. It’s a simple yet stylish piece that works well in any casual wardrobe, and it’s sure to be a go-to favorite!
